otp.title: One time password
otp.description: Enter 6 digits code send to your email.
otp.successDesc: Please check your email for the code.

Hero.title: Your Next Chapter, Curated.
Hero.subtitle: At RIM GLOBAL, we've reimagined the pre-owned car experience for Federal Way. Explore our meticulously curated collection of quality-inspected vehicles and discover the confidence of a transparent, hassle-free journey.

Features.description: We partner with trusted local and national lenders to offer flexible financing solutions. Our team is here to guide you to a plan that aligns with your budget, ensuring a clear and transparent process from start to finish.

Brands.title: A Curated Collection of Premier Brands
Brands.description: Our portfolio features a meticulously selected range of vehicles from the world's most respected automotive names. With {count} vehicles currently in our collection, your next chapter awaits.

0.quote: The most seamless car buying experience I've ever had. The team was professional, transparent, and incredibly helpful. I got a great car at a fair price.
0.name: Alex R.

1.quote: I was dreading the process of buying a used car, but they made it so easy. No pressure, just genuine advice. Highly recommended!
1.name: Samantha B.

2.quote: Found the exact model I was looking for in pristine condition. The quality of their collection is top-notch. I'll definitely be back for my next car.
2.name: Michael T.

Financing.title: Financing That Fits Your Life
Financing.description: At RIM GLOBAL, we believe financing your vehicle should be as transparent and straightforward as buying it. We partner with trusted local and national lenders to offer flexible solutions tailored to your unique situation. Our team is here to guide you through every step, ensuring a clear, hassle-free process that puts you in the driver's seat with confidence.

calculator.title: Payment Calculator
calculator.disclaimer: This calculator is for estimation purposes only. Actual payments may vary based on credit score, lender criteria, and other factors.

curation.title: Curation over Volume:
curation.description: We don't aim to have the most cars, just the best. Each vehicle in our collection is hand-selected and rigorously inspected to meet our high standards of quality, reliability, and value. We seek out vehicles with character and a story, ensuring you're not just buying a car, but a piece of automotive history.

transparency.title: Transparency at the Core:
transparency.description: The traditional car-buying experience is often clouded with uncertainty. We're changing that. From clear, upfront pricing to comprehensive vehicle history reports, we provide all the information you need to make a confident and informed decision. No hidden fees, no last-minute surprises.

partnership.title: A Partnership Approach:
partnership.description: We see ourselves as your personal automotive curators, not just salespeople. Our goal is to build a long-term relationship based on trust and mutual respect. We're here to offer expert advice and a no-pressure environment, helping you find the perfect vehicle that fits your lifestyle and budget.

Contact.title: Visit Our Federal Way Showroom
Contact.description: Experience the RIM GLOBAL difference in person. Our showroom is designed to provide a comfortable and premium viewing experience. The map below shows our general location in Federal Way.

welcome.title: You are one step closer to owning this vehicle.
welcome.subtitle: Follow the steps below to complete your reservation.
welcome.step1: A simple, secure two-step reservation process.
welcome.step2: Select your preferred handover date and provide your contact details.

submitDetails.terms: I agree to the terms and conditions

successPage.title: Booking Confirmed!
successPage.description: Thank you for your reservation. We will see you soon.

settings.logoutDesc: This will log out out of all of your sessions across all of your devices of which you are currently logged into.

notAvailable.description: Don't stress though - we got mad other rides that'll have you cruising in style. Peep the rest of our fire collection on the site!
